name: Traveler
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You teleport yourself and any number of creatures you choose within 10 feet to any point within range you can see. Creatures preserve their relative location, and you must choose a location that can accommodate all creatures you are teleporting.

You can teleport again for 2 AP on each subsequent turn for the duration of the spell.
empower: Choose one - duration increased to 1 hour, or radius increased to 30 feet, or you do not need sight of the destination.
